Data Scientist: Expert in data analysis, machine learning, statistical modeling, Python, Pandas, and SQL.
Web Developer: Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, front-end and back-end development, and responsive design.
Front end Developer: Experienced in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, front-end and back-end development, and responsive design.
DevOps Engineer: Skilled in CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, and system automation.
AI/ML Engineer: Hands-on with deep learning, computer vision, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and model optimization.
Business Analyst: Proficient in Excel, Power BI, requirement gathering, stakeholder communication, and SQL.
Android Developer: Builds apps using Java, Kotlin, Android SDK, UI design, and mobile architecture.
Full Stack Developer: Works with React, Node.js, databases, REST APIs, and full-cycle application development.
Cloud Engineer: Knowledge of Azure, GCP, AWS, cloud deployments, containers, and networking.
Cybersecurity Analyst: Understands security audits, vulnerability testing, SIEM tools, and incident response.
